Summary Note:
The RM first met Dekkers Mulders Verhoeven at a luxury car show in Amsterdam. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Dekkers Mulders Verhoeven is a 36 year old Private Equity Investor from Netherlands. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Dekkers Mulders Verhoeven and Eva tied the knot in 2020. Their children are named Ilona and Stevens.
Education Background:
Dekkers graduated from Het Rijnlands Lyceum Oegstgeest in 2006.
Dekkers earned his degree from Erasmus University Rotterdam in 2012.
Occupation History:
Dekkers Mulders Verhoeven is a seasoned professional with over 12 years of experience.
At ABN AMRO Group N.V., Dekkers Mulders Verhoeven held the position of Investment Banker from 2013 to 2014, developing essential skills in the field.
At SNS Bank N.V., he held the position of Private Equity Investor from 2015 to 2025, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 120000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Arnhem and Utrecht, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Tech Entrepreneur, he received an inheritance of 6820000 EUR in 2019, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
